description:
Iona Grace and Beretta James are good work friends, so Iona invites Beretta to check out the Upper Floor. Beretta comes up not knowing quite what to expect, but this hard bodied slut takes to service quickly. Today is Ionas first Dom lesson from The Pope and the Steward and she needed some meat to practice with, thus Berettas invitation.
Once Beretta is stripped of her clothing in a mess of embarrassed giggles, she submits to a body inspection and is reduced to an object to be studied upon. The lesson starts with spanking and ends with The Steward and Iona taking turns fucking Beretta until she is screaming and cumming.
title: Fresh Meat: Beretta James
